name: Serving up some bad formatting (Easy)
description: The server wants you to interact with it, but you should ensure that your interactions are formatted. Interact with the server via `$ nc <server-ip> 1111`.

name: Serving up some bad formatting (Hard)
description: The server wants you to interact with it, but you should ensure that your interactions are formatted. Interact with the server via `$ nc <server-ip> 2222`.
